word:
God holds every one responsible for the influence that surrounds his soul, on his own account, and on the account of others. He calls upon young men and young women to be strictly temperate and conscientious in the use of their faculties of mind and body. Their capabilities can be developed only by the diligent use and 


                                                                 89. 

wise appropriation of their powers to the glory of God and the benefit of their fellow-men.
